kube_log.title: Kube Log Format
kube_log.description: Log format used in custom logs from kube.

sample.line: 2017-08-31T14:31:27Z [not.namenode-2100393612-q] 17/08/31 14:31:27 INFO window.RollingWindowManager: topN size for command setPermission is: 0
2017-08-31T14:32:27Z [not.namenode-2100393612-q] 17/08/31 14:32:27 INFO window.RollingWindowManager: topN size for command getfileinfo is: 0

kube_syslog.title: Kube SysLog Format
kube_syslog.description: Log format used in custom logs from kube.

sample.line: 2017-08-31T15:15:40Z ip-10-192-76-101.eu-west-1.compute.internal r-kubernetes-kubelet-4-987e24c7[13633] E0831 15:15:40.874779   13633 kubelet_volumes.go:114] Orphaned pod "ef34986a-87f5-11e7-8152-02cc7a9d7269" found, but volume paths are still present on disk.

2017-08-31T15:15:40Z ip-10-192-76-35 r-kubernetes-kubelet-1-5dd096f7[26225] E0831 15:15:40.998864   26225 kubelet_volumes.go:114] Orphaned pod "7c698ae5-82f2-11e7-82b2-02cc7a9d7269" found, but volume paths are still present on disk.
